meanings.definition: The quality of being desirable or worthy of envy.
meanings.sent1: Her kindness and generosity gave her an enviableness that everyone admired.
meanings.sent2: The model's beauty and grace made her enviableness evident to all.
meanings.sent3: His new car had an enviableness that made his friends want to go for a ride.
meanings.sent4: The successful entrepreneur's lifestyle exuded an enviableness that inspired many.
meanings.sent5: The enviableness of her success shone brightly among her peers.

meanings.sent1: The team's victory brought about an enviableness among their competitors.
meanings.sent2: His promotion to a higher position at work signaled his enviableness to others.
meanings.sent3: The cat's ability to sleep all day had an enviableness that made the dog jealous.
meanings.sent4: The tranquility of the beach resort created an enviableness that attracted many visitors.
meanings.sent5: The enviableness of her lifestyle was evident in the way she carried herself.
